text.paragraphText: Ours started during a spicy meeting between Italy and Sweden. We noticed straight away that we shared a common interest in creating films that pushes boundaries and stands out from the crowd. You know, like most moviemakers.

But after years of commercials, short films, music videos, scripts and B2B content we finally put our heads together and ARE Productions was born. Based in Stockholm, we now continue to make awesome, boundary-pushing films with a special twist on branding and storytelling.
While we have some fun along the way of course.
